response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to both of us, with an estimated worth of $12,000 to you. Considering the mutual benefits and the high value attached to this item, I am proposing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer not only represents a substantial saving but also secures your exclusive access to this top-tier product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 11000}
